text: Memories of Underdevelopment () is a 1968 Cuban drama movie directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea and based on the novel Inconsolable Memories by Edmundo Desnoes (who also stars). It stars Sergio Corrieri, Daisy Granados, René Depestre and was distributed by ICAIC. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 drama movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea
title: Memories of Underdevelopment
